3048.name: Mist Pearl
3048.desc: A pearl used by Seafolk raiders to strengthen their magic! Collect them to bolster your team in Duskwillow!

3049.name: Snowdust
3049.desc: Mysterious dust that is easily mistaken for snow, it can imbue magical items with more power. Collect to bolster your power in Frigore!

3050.name: Infinity's Spellstone
3050.desc: This crystalline orb thrums with raw energy. Combine with Heaven Feather to summon Infinity!

3051.name: Heaven Feather
3051.desc: Combine this feather with Infinity's Spellstone to summon Infinity!

3052.name: Hero's Coin
3052.desc: Used to upgrade battleground effects in the Gloomy Lands!

3053.name: Purple Fire Soul
3053.desc: The soul emits a faint heat and squirms beneath your touch. Collect to bolster your power in The Void Plane!

3054.name: Dragon Breath Essence
3054.desc: Combine this Dragon Breath with Zhulong's Spellstone to summon Zhulong!

3055.name: Zhulong's Spellstone
3055.desc: Beneath the Spellstone's shell, you can feel something stirring inside it. Combine with Dragon Breath Essence to summon Zhulong!

3056.name: Honeycomb
3056.desc: The Beetleton residents' cuisine grants Rayne's Spiritlings greater powers. Collect to bolster your power in Beetleton Bunker!

3057.name: Cluster
3057.desc: Combine this honeycomb cluster with Dune Hopper's Spellstone to earn a new card!

3058.name: Dune Hopper's Spellstone
3058.desc: This larva was crystallized within the walls of Beetleton Bunker. Combine with Cluster to summon Dune Hopper!

3059.name: Mini Jellyfish
3059.desc: The Mini Jellyfish are the power supply for the underwater temple. Collect to bolster your power in Pharos Temple!

3060.name: Temple Crystal
3060.desc: Combine this Temple Crystal with Pharite Snapjaw's Spellstone to earn a new card!

3061.name: Pharite Snapjaw's Spellstone
3061.desc: This fish egg seems to have a creature inside it. Combine with Temple Crystal to summon Pharite Snapjaw!

3062.name: Fireshard
3062.desc: The fiery fragment can instill new powers in latent gemstones. Collect to bolster your power in Fireshard Mine!

3063.name: Metallic Fireshard
3063.desc: The metallic fragment glows with a different energy than average fireshards. Combine with Cog Spellstone to summon Vali, the Thunderer!

3064.name: Cog Spellstone
3064.desc: This cog has some kind of creature in it. Combine with Metallic Fireshard to summon Vali, the Thunderer!

3065.name: Breezy Wind
3065.desc: This Elemental powers up the Celestial Orbs. Collect to bolster your power in The Celestial Vault!

3066.name: Dawn Feather
3066.desc: It's a feather from a legendary bird that only appears at Dawn. Combine with Spiky Egg to summon Eos!

3067.name: Spiky Egg
3067.desc: You can hear something moving beneath the egg's spiky layer. Combine with Dawn Feather to summon Eos!

3068.name: Word Eater
3068.desc: This little spirit is attracted to written words and glyphs, powering up Yuriel's Mystic Tomes. Collect to bolster your power in Skyhaven!

3069.name: Liquid Fire
3069.desc: The contents of this bottle are eternally bubbling, despite the glass being cool to the touch. Combine with Rimelight Crusader's Spellstone to summon Rimelight Crusader!

3070.name: Rimelight Crusader's Spellstone
3070.desc: The frigid feather has been carefully preserved in eternal ice. Combine with Liquid Fire to summon Rimelight Crusader!

3071.name: Bonbon Sparklers
3071.desc: Rock candy shaped like a small firework, it pops loudly when consumed. Collect to bolster your power in Goblin Rise Stronghold!

3072.name: Goblin Gadget
3072.desc: The goblins use this device to train dragons to obey them. Combine with Pinpin, Dragon Handler's Spellstone to summon Pinpin, Dragon Handler!

3073.name: Pinpin's Spellstone
3073.desc: This dragon egg Spellstone houses the dragon Broodus and his master Pinpin. Combine with Goblin Gadget to summon Pinpin, Dragon Handler!

3074.name: Tropical Coconut
3074.desc: The coconut has absorbed the nutrients and magical properties from the island's sandy soil. Collect to bolster your power in Forgotten Island!

3075.name: Hollow Coconut
3075.desc: This coconut is light, just a shell of a greater creature. Combine with Zind's Spellstone to summon Hunter Zind!

3076.name: Zind's Spellstone
3076.desc: This fish egg Spellstone contains the essence of the great hunter Zind. Combine with Hollow Coconut to summon Hunter Zind!

3077.name: Golden Leaf
3077.desc: Ground golden leaves contain enough energy to kickstart your airship's functions. Collect to bolster your power in Golden Crown Village!

3078.name: Raw Iron
3078.desc: Frogs who can stomach iron are said to grow steel skin. Combine with Stoneclad Toad's Spellstone to summon Stoneclad Toad!

3079.name: Stoneclad Toad's Spellstone
3079.desc: This Dawnglow flower is heavily coveted by the Golden Crown Frogs. Combine with Raw Iron to summon Stoneclad Toad!

3080.name: Black Blossom
3080.desc: Flowers that have absorbed The Void's power after being exposed to massive amounts of energy. Collect to bolster your power in Desolate Red Valley!

3081.name: Obsidian
3081.desc: Elementals can absorb this volcanic rock to grow harder skin. Combine with Gem Harvester's Spellstone to summon Gem Harvester!

3082.name: Gem Harvester's Spellstone
3082.desc: This Spellstone has a small lightning bug inside it. Combine with Obsidian to summon Gem Harvester!

3083.name: Dragon Claw
3083.desc: Dragons exposed to arcane energy shed their claw sheaths, which can be used as an energy catalyst. Collect to bolster your power in Tarragon Peak!

3084.name: Mother's Fire
3084.desc: Mother Dragons from Tarragon have the hottest fiery breath. Combine with Ignus' Spellstone to summon Ignus!

3085.name: Ignus' Spellstone
3085.desc: A Spellstone with a baby dragonling cracking from its shell. Combine with Mother's Fire to summon Ignus!

3086.name: Gladius Coin
3086.desc: Currency used to upgrade your gear and friends' abilities. Collect to bolster your power in Gladius Arena!

3087.name: Angel Hawk Feather
3087.desc: A feather plucked from an Avian so noble that he became an Angel. Combine with Habrok's Spellstone to summon Habrok, the Lance!

3088.name: Habrok's Spellstone
3088.desc: A Spellstone with a beating heart beneath the oddly-furred shell. Combine with Angel Hawk Feather to summon Habrok, the Lance!

3089.name: Corroded Mist Pearl
3089.desc: Mist pearls that have lost their power to summon Scylla. Collect to bolster your power in Duskwillow Rebuilt!

3090.name: Dark Gold Key
3090.desc: A key with the power to open a dark dimension. Combine with Messina's Spellstone to summon Messina's Choice!

3091.name: Messina's Spellstone
3091.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that has seen better days. Combine with Dark Gold Key to summon Messina's Choice!

3092.name: Dark Honey
3092.desc: The Beetleton residents' cuisine has been imbued with strange energy. Feed them to Rayne's Spiritlings to unlock their power in Distorted Beetleton!

3093.name: Revolution Flame
3093.desc: A flame of burning revolution. Combine with Warrior Karna's Spellstone to summon Warrior Karna!

3094.name: Warrior Karna's Spellstone
3094.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that has seen better days. Combine with Revolution Flame to summon Warrior Karna!

3095.name: Enchanted Iron
3095.desc: Natural Minerals in the Salt Wastes radiate with a special energy. Use them on the Temple Glyphs to increase their power!

3096.name: Tadpole Egg
3096.desc: A small egg with a tadpole inside. Combine with Sproutfrog's Spellstone to summon Sproutfrog Rainwisher!

3097.name: Sproutfrog's Spellstone
3097.desc: A Spellstone in the shape of a crumpled letter that Decim's dragonling took a bite off of. Combine with Tadpole to summon Sproutfrog Rainwisher!

3098.name: Pillar Soul
3098.desc: A soul lost in The Abyss. Send them to the Titans so they can recover their power!

3099.name: Whitesail's Spellstone
3099.desc: An egg left in a nest home of both a dragon and avian. Combine with Dragon Breath Crystal to create Whitesail Wyvern!

3100.name: Dragon Breath Crystal
3100.desc: A dragon mother's warm breath of fire, enshrined in a crystal. Combine with Whitesail's Spellstone to create Whitesail Wyvern!

3101.name: Soul of Silver
3101.desc: A budding Elemental born of wind and water. Collect to bolster your power in Stormy Seastone Citadel!

3102.name: Avalanche Equine Spellstone
3102.desc: An express request for the continent's finest Elemental Steeds. Combine with Elemental Residue to summon Avalanche Equine!

3103.name: Elemental Residue
3103.desc: Remnant stones carried by Elementals, now imbued with their power. Combine with Avalanche Equine Spellstone to summon Avalanche Equine!

3104.name: Void Essence
3104.desc: A bottle of Undead Essence combined with power from The Void. Collect them for Malchior to build his Defense System!

3105.name: Void Flower
3105.desc: A flower that has bathed in the unholy light from The Void. Combine with Reks' Spellstone to Summon Reks, the Forlorn!

3106.name: Reks' Spellstone
3106.desc: A Spellstone containing a former tragic Goblin King's spirit. Combine with Void Flower to summon Reks, the Forlorn!

3107.name: Wyld Leaf
3107.desc: A leaf from a tree that has grown with unnatural magic. Collect them and use them to fuel your Airship!

3108.name: Fallen Crest Feather
3108.desc: A Feather from the Fallen Crest order. Combine with Wrath's Spellstone to Summon Wrath!

3109.name: Wrath's Spellstone
3109.desc: A Spellstone containing an Angel of the Fallen Crest. Combine with Fallen Crest Feather to summon Wrath!

3110.name: Void Remnant
3110.desc: A leftover remnant of The Void. Purge them to fuel the ancient technology in the Swamp!

3111.name: Dawnglow Flower
3111.desc: An arcane flower from Dawnglow. Combine with Conjured Dragon's Spellstone to Summon Conjured Dragon!

3112.name: Conjured Dragon's Spellstone
3112.desc: A Spellstone containing a legendary dragon of water. Combine with Dawnglow Flower to summon Conjured Dragon!

3113.name: Wisp Fragment
3113.desc: A tiny spirit that can band together to become a soul wisp. Use them to power Yuriel's Tomes!

3114.name: Bloodmist Feather
3114.desc: A Feather from the lost marsh of Bloodmist. Combine with Bloodmist Harpy's Spellstone to summon Bloodmist Harpy!

3115.name: Bloodmist Harpy's Spellstone
3115.desc: A Spellstone containing an artificially made creature. Combine with Bloodmist Feather to summon Bloodmist Harpy!

3116.name: Karthos Ember
3116.desc: An ember from the land of Karthos, imbued with magical properties. Use them to power up the Karthos Crystals!

3117.name: Karthos's Flame
3117.desc: An everburning flame from Karthos. Combine with Slagspirit's Spellstone to summon Slagspirit!

3118.name: Slagspirit's Spellstone
3118.desc: A Spellstone containing an ancient spirit of Karthos. Combine with Karthos's Flame to summon Slagspirit!

3119.name: Dragon Talons
3119.desc: The spirits of dragon legends who died protecting Tarragon Peak. Receive their blessing by offering Dragon Talons!

3120.name: Tropical Callstone
3120.desc: A Coconut imbued with magical properties of a tropical island. Combine with Siren's Spellstone to summon Siren!

3121.name: Siren's Spellstone
3121.desc: A Spellstone containing the soul of a half goblin, half fish. Combine with Tropical Callstone to summon Siren!

3122.name: Gladius Currency
3122.desc: An ancient, now unused currency that still motivates spirits of the Fallen. Collect to bolster your power in Gladius Scriptorium!

3123.name: Acquatic Soul
3123.desc: A small creature found living in a Skyhaven pond. Combine with Noble Swordfish's Spellstone to summon Noble Swordfish!

3124.name: Noble Swordfish Spellstone
3124.desc: A Spellstone formed from a tear of Scylla. Combine with Acquatic Soul to summon Noble Swordfish!

3125.name: Angel Plume
3125.desc: A feather doused in the magical properties of Skyhaven. Collect to bolster your power in Skyhaven Assault!

3126.name: Fiery Soul
3126.desc: A soul forged in the lava depths of Tarragon. Combine with Herald of Judgement's Spellstone to summon Herald of Judgement!

3127.name: Herald of Judgment's Spellstone
3127.desc: A Spellstone formed between the earth of Tarragon and air of Skyhaven. Combine with Fiery Soul to summon the Herald of Judgement!

3128.name: Element Soul
3128.desc: A small spirit formed from the powers of Aether, Chaos, and Wyld. Collect to bolster your power in Conflux Convergence!

3129.name: Void Soul
3129.desc: A soul trapped in the Void. Combine with Shattered Spellstone to summon Shatterstone Anomaly!

3130.name: Shattered Spellstone
3130.desc: A collection of shattered Spellstones. Combine with Void Soul to summon Shatterstone Anomaly!

4001.name: Inscription Powder
4001.desc: Used for Runecrafting. Found during Missions.

4011.name: Rare Runeshell
4011.desc: The key ingredient for Rare Runes. Found during Bounties.

4012.name: Epic Runeshell
4012.desc: The key ingredient for Epic Runes. Found during Bounties.

4013.name: Legendary Rune Sliver
4013.desc: One of three slivers needed to create a Legendary Rune. Found during Bounties.
